theBalance:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theBalance:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theBalance:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theBalance:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theBalance:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theBalance:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theBalance:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theBalance:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theBalance:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theBalance:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theBalance:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theBalance:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theBalance:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
